verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
We have heard of all the stories
Of how you healed the deaf and blind
You did miracles and wonders
Would you repeat them in our time

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Lord we thank you for your presence
How you promised not leave
Come and clothe us in Your power
Come and set the captives free

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Hear your people crying out
Holy Spirit would You come
Hear Your people crying out
Holy Spirit would you come

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
We still you're believe that you're moving
And that you're with us today
Help us to see what you are doing
We don't want to get in your way

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
We've prayed our prayers
We've made our plans
If you're not in it, we don't want it
Oh God would you move

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines:
Only you can heal our land
Holy Spirit, come and fill us
Oh God would you move?
